snippet.title: IN MEMORY OF AMBER RAE | Born Without Kidneys at 36 Weeks
snippet.description:
Mom Bre tells of her daughter Amber Rae and how she was born without kidneys (bilateral renal agenesis) like her older brother Jeff Jr. Amber died after living for only 1 hour. Bre tells of her and her husband's grief of losing their 2nd child Jeff Jr first, then getting pregnant and were devastated when they were told Amber didn't have kidneys either.

Happy Birthday today, Amber!

Listen to Bre's husband Jeff's account of Amber's birth and death here: https://youtu.be/WkTp7uX5sFU

DONATE $5 (aka "buy us a coffee/hot cocoa") to support the continued production of these stories. We appreciate all the help toward production and hosting costs. 

Or if you want to purchase an "Always a Part of Us" Legacy Gift for $20, you'll be providing to one of these families that shares their story, full transcriptions, mp3s, and mp4s of the recordings of their baby's birth story and advice episodes for their family history records. You will also get a shout-out on an upcoming episode. Thank you!
Donate: https://ko-fi.com/stillapartofus

Time Stamps:
00:00 Amber Rae
01:14 Some family history
05:28 Pregnancy
08:28 1st Ultrasound
16:01 2nd Ultrasound 
25:43 Preparations for birth and funeral
38:30 Going to the hospital
43:40 Birth
44:54 Time with Amber after birth
58:30 Going home
1:01:45 Funeral
1:08:49 Now what?

SUBSCRIBE to our YouTube channel for more birth stories from families who have experienced a stillbirth or infant loss. We're grateful that you're part of our community! https://www.youtube.com/stillapartofus

SUBSCRIBE to our podcast Still A Part of Us, wherever you find podcasts.

Links (some of these links are affiliate links, which means we may get a small commission off your purchase, at no extra cost to you):
Website: http://stillapartofus.com/
Grief Support Groups: https://nationalshare.org/

Mom Music: "Flickering Flame" by Josh Woodward. Free download: http://joshwoodward.com/​​.
